metadata.title: Standard COBOL Copybook Library
metadata.description: Comprehensive collection of standard and industry copybooks for RAG training

sql_copybooks.name: SQL Communication Area
sql_copybooks.description: Standard DB2 SQLCA for error handling
sql_copybooks.cobol:
01  SQLCA.
           05  SQLCAID        PIC X(8) VALUE 'SQLCA   '.
           05  SQLCABC        PIC S9(9) COMP-5 VALUE 136.
           05  SQLCODE        PIC S9(9) COMP-5.
           05  SQLERRM.
               49  SQLERRML   PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
               49  SQLERRMC   PIC X(70).
           05  SQLERRP        PIC X(8).
           05  SQLERRD        PIC S9(9) COMP-5 OCCURS 6.
           05  SQLWARN.
               10  SQLWARN0   PIC X.
               10  SQLWARN1   PIC X.
               10  SQLWARN2   PIC X.
               10  SQLWARN3   PIC X.
               10  SQLWARN4   PIC X.
               10  SQLWARN5   PIC X.
               10  SQLWARN6   PIC X.
               10  SQLWARN7   PIC X.
               10  SQLWARN8   PIC X.
               10  SQLWARN9   PIC X.
               10  SQLWARNA   PIC X.
           05  SQLSTATE       PIC X(5).

common_sqlcodes.-811: Multiple rows returned for singleton SELECT
common_sqlcodes.-818: Timestamp mismatch between DBRM and plan

sql_copybooks.name: SQL Descriptor Area
sql_copybooks.description: Dynamic SQL parameter and result descriptor
sql_copybooks.cobol:
01  SQLDA.
           05  SQLDAID        PIC X(8) VALUE 'SQLDA   '.
           05  SQLDABC        PIC S9(9) COMP-5.
           05  SQLN           PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
           05  SQLD           PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
           05  SQLVAR OCCURS 1 TO 750 TIMES
                      DEPENDING ON SQLN.
               10  SQLTYPE    PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
               10  SQLLEN     PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
               10  SQLDATA    POINTER.
               10  SQLIND     POINTER.
               10  SQLNAME.
                   49  SQLNAMEL PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
                   49  SQLNAMEC PIC X(30).

sql_copybooks.name: DCLGEN Customer Table
sql_copybooks.description: DB2 DCLGEN generated copybook for CUSTOMER table
sql_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * DCLGEN TABLE(CUSTOMER)                                        *
      *        LIBRARY(PROD.COPYLIB)                                  *
      *        LANGUAGE(COBOL)                                        *
      *        QUOTE                                                  *
      ******************************************************************
           EXEC SQL DECLARE CUSTOMER TABLE
           ( CUST_ID              CHAR(10) NOT NULL,
             CUST_NAME            VARCHAR(50),
             CUST_TYPE            CHAR(1),
             CUST_STATUS          CHAR(1),
             CUST_BALANCE         DECIMAL(13,2),
             CUST_CREDIT_LIMIT    DECIMAL(11,2),
             CUST_OPEN_DATE       DATE,
             CUST_LAST_ACTIVITY   TIMESTAMP,
             CUST_SSN             CHAR(9),
             CUST_ADDRESS         VARCHAR(100),
             CUST_CITY            CHAR(30),
             CUST_STATE           CHAR(2),
             CUST_ZIP             CHAR(10),
             CUST_PHONE           CHAR(15),
             CUST_EMAIL           VARCHAR(100)
           ) END-EXEC.
      ******************************************************************
      * COBOL DECLARATION FOR TABLE CUSTOMER                          *
      ******************************************************************
       01  DCLCUSTOMER.
           10 CUST-ID             PIC X(10).
           10 CUST-NAME.
              49 CUST-NAME-LEN    PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
              49 CUST-NAME-TEXT   PIC X(50).
           10 CUST-TYPE           PIC X(1).
           10 CUST-STATUS         PIC X(1).
           10 CUST-BALANCE        PIC S9(11)V9(2) COMP-3.
           10 CUST-CREDIT-LIMIT   PIC S9(9)V9(2) COMP-3.
           10 CUST-OPEN-DATE      PIC X(10).
           10 CUST-LAST-ACTIVITY  PIC X(26).
           10 CUST-SSN            PIC X(9).
           10 CUST-ADDRESS.
              49 CUST-ADDRESS-LEN PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
              49 CUST-ADDRESS-TEXT PIC X(100).
           10 CUST-CITY           PIC X(30).
           10 CUST-STATE          PIC X(2).
           10 CUST-ZIP            PIC X(10).
           10 CUST-PHONE          PIC X(15).
           10 CUST-EMAIL.
              49 CUST-EMAIL-LEN   PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
              49 CUST-EMAIL-TEXT  PIC X(100).
      ******************************************************************
      * INDICATOR VARIABLE STRUCTURE                                  *
      ******************************************************************
       01  ICUSTOMER.
           10 ICUST-NAME          PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
           10 ICUST-BALANCE       PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
           10 ICUST-ADDRESS       PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
           10 ICUST-EMAIL         PIC S9(4) COMP-5.

modern_equivalent.python:
from sqlalchemy import Column, String, Numeric, Date, DateTime
from sqlalchemy.ext.declarative import declarative_base

Base = declarative_base()

class Customer(Base):
    __tablename__ = 'CUSTOMER'
    
    cust_id = Column(String(10), primary_key=True)
    cust_name = Column(String(50))
    cust_balance = Column(Numeric(13, 2))
    cust_open_date = Column(Date)
    cust_last_activity = Column(DateTime)

sql_copybooks.name: DCLGEN Account Table
sql_copybooks.description: DB2 DCLGEN generated copybook for ACCOUNT table
sql_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * DCLGEN TABLE(ACCOUNT)                                         *
      ******************************************************************
           EXEC SQL DECLARE ACCOUNT TABLE
           ( ACCT_ID              CHAR(12) NOT NULL,
             ACCT_CUST_ID         CHAR(10) NOT NULL,
             ACCT_TYPE            CHAR(2),
             ACCT_STATUS          CHAR(1),
             ACCT_BALANCE         DECIMAL(15,2),
             ACCT_AVAILABLE       DECIMAL(15,2),
             ACCT_INTEREST_RATE   DECIMAL(5,4),
             ACCT_OPEN_DATE       DATE,
             ACCT_LAST_TRANS_DATE DATE,
             ACCT_LAST_TRANS_AMT  DECIMAL(13,2),
             ACCT_OVERDRAFT_LIMIT DECIMAL(11,2),
             ACCT_BRANCH_ID       CHAR(6)
           ) END-EXEC.
      ******************************************************************
       01  DCLACCOUNT.
           10 ACCT-ID             PIC X(12).
           10 ACCT-CUST-ID        PIC X(10).
           10 ACCT-TYPE           PIC X(2).
              88 ACCT-TYPE-CHECKING VALUE 'CK'.
              88 ACCT-TYPE-SAVINGS  VALUE 'SV'.
              88 ACCT-TYPE-MONEY-MKT VALUE 'MM'.
              88 ACCT-TYPE-CD       VALUE 'CD'.
              88 ACCT-TYPE-LOAN     VALUE 'LN'.
              88 ACCT-TYPE-CREDIT   VALUE 'CC'.
           10 ACCT-STATUS         PIC X(1).
              88 ACCT-STATUS-ACTIVE VALUE 'A'.
              88 ACCT-STATUS-CLOSED VALUE 'C'.
              88 ACCT-STATUS-FROZEN VALUE 'F'.
              88 ACCT-STATUS-DORMANT VALUE 'D'.
           10 ACCT-BALANCE        PIC S9(13)V9(2) COMP-3.
           10 ACCT-AVAILABLE      PIC S9(13)V9(2) COMP-3.
           10 ACCT-INTEREST-RATE  PIC S9(1)V9(4) COMP-3.
           10 ACCT-OPEN-DATE      PIC X(10).
           10 ACCT-LAST-TRANS-DATE PIC X(10).
           10 ACCT-LAST-TRANS-AMT PIC S9(11)V9(2) COMP-3.
           10 ACCT-OVERDRAFT-LIMIT PIC S9(9)V9(2) COMP-3.
           10 ACCT-BRANCH-ID      PIC X(6).

sql_copybooks.name: DCLGEN Transaction Table
sql_copybooks.description: DB2 DCLGEN generated copybook for TRANSACTION table
sql_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * DCLGEN TABLE(TRANSACTION)                                     *
      ******************************************************************
           EXEC SQL DECLARE TRANSACTION TABLE
           ( TRANS_ID             CHAR(20) NOT NULL,
             TRANS_ACCT_ID        CHAR(12) NOT NULL,
             TRANS_TYPE           CHAR(2),
             TRANS_AMOUNT         DECIMAL(13,2),
             TRANS_DATE           DATE,
             TRANS_TIME           TIME,
             TRANS_TIMESTAMP      TIMESTAMP,
             TRANS_DESCRIPTION    VARCHAR(100),
             TRANS_REF_NUM        CHAR(23),
             TRANS_CHANNEL        CHAR(3),
             TRANS_TELLER_ID      CHAR(8),
             TRANS_BRANCH_ID      CHAR(6),
             TRANS_STATUS         CHAR(1),
             TRANS_REVERSAL_ID    CHAR(20)
           ) END-EXEC.
      ******************************************************************
       01  DCLTRANSACTION.
           10 TRANS-ID            PIC X(20).
           10 TRANS-ACCT-ID       PIC X(12).
           10 TRANS-TYPE          PIC X(2).
              88 TRANS-TYPE-DEPOSIT    VALUE 'DP'.
              88 TRANS-TYPE-WITHDRAWAL VALUE 'WD'.
              88 TRANS-TYPE-TRANSFER   VALUE 'TR'.
              88 TRANS-TYPE-PAYMENT    VALUE 'PY'.
              88 TRANS-TYPE-FEE        VALUE 'FE'.
              88 TRANS-TYPE-INTEREST   VALUE 'IN'.
              88 TRANS-TYPE-ADJUSTMENT VALUE 'AJ'.
              88 TRANS-TYPE-REVERSAL   VALUE 'RV'.
           10 TRANS-AMOUNT        PIC S9(11)V9(2) COMP-3.
           10 TRANS-DATE          PIC X(10).
           10 TRANS-TIME          PIC X(8).
           10 TRANS-TIMESTAMP     PIC X(26).
           10 TRANS-DESCRIPTION.
              49 TRANS-DESC-LEN   PIC S9(4) COMP-5.
              49 TRANS-DESC-TEXT  PIC X(100).
           10 TRANS-REF-NUM       PIC X(23).
           10 TRANS-CHANNEL       PIC X(3).
              88 TRANS-CHANNEL-BRANCH VALUE 'BRN'.
              88 TRANS-CHANNEL-ATM    VALUE 'ATM'.
              88 TRANS-CHANNEL-ONLINE VALUE 'ONL'.
              88 TRANS-CHANNEL-MOBILE VALUE 'MOB'.
              88 TRANS-CHANNEL-PHONE  VALUE 'PHN'.
              88 TRANS-CHANNEL-ACH    VALUE 'ACH'.
              88 TRANS-CHANNEL-WIRE   VALUE 'WIR'.
           10 TRANS-TELLER-ID     PIC X(8).
           10 TRANS-BRANCH-ID     PIC X(6).
           10 TRANS-STATUS        PIC X(1).
              88 TRANS-STATUS-POSTED  VALUE 'P'.
              88 TRANS-STATUS-PENDING VALUE 'N'.
              88 TRANS-STATUS-REVERSED VALUE 'R'.
              88 TRANS-STATUS-HOLD    VALUE 'H'.
           10 TRANS-REVERSAL-ID   PIC X(20).

cics_copybooks.name: CICS Attention Identifier
cics_copybooks.description: Standard CICS AID values for keyboard handling
cics_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * DFHAID - CICS ATTENTION IDENTIFIER BYTES                      *
      ******************************************************************
       01  DFHAID.
           02  DFHNULL   PIC X VALUE IS ' '.
           02  DFHENTER  PIC X VALUE IS ''''.
           02  DFHCLEAR  PIC X VALUE IS '_'.
           02  DFHCLRP   PIC X VALUE IS '¦'.
           02  DFHPEN    PIC X VALUE IS '='.
           02  DFHOPID   PIC X VALUE IS 'W'.
           02  DFHMSRE   PIC X VALUE IS 'X'.
           02  DFHSTRF   PIC X VALUE IS 'h'.
           02  DFHTRIG   PIC X VALUE IS '"'.
           02  DFHPA1    PIC X VALUE IS '%'.
           02  DFHPA2    PIC X VALUE IS '>'.
           02  DFHPA3    PIC X VALUE IS ','.
           02  DFHPF1    PIC X VALUE IS '1'.
           02  DFHPF2    PIC X VALUE IS '2'.
           02  DFHPF3    PIC X VALUE IS '3'.
           02  DFHPF4    PIC X VALUE IS '4'.
           02  DFHPF5    PIC X VALUE IS '5'.
           02  DFHPF6    PIC X VALUE IS '6'.
           02  DFHPF7    PIC X VALUE IS '7'.
           02  DFHPF8    PIC X VALUE IS '8'.
           02  DFHPF9    PIC X VALUE IS '9'.
           02  DFHPF10   PIC X VALUE IS ':'.
           02  DFHPF11   PIC X VALUE IS '#'.
           02  DFHPF12   PIC X VALUE IS '@'.
           02  DFHPF13   PIC X VALUE IS 'A'.
           02  DFHPF14   PIC X VALUE IS 'B'.
           02  DFHPF15   PIC X VALUE IS 'C'.
           02  DFHPF16   PIC X VALUE IS 'D'.
           02  DFHPF17   PIC X VALUE IS 'E'.
           02  DFHPF18   PIC X VALUE IS 'F'.
           02  DFHPF19   PIC X VALUE IS 'G'.
           02  DFHPF20   PIC X VALUE IS 'H'.
           02  DFHPF21   PIC X VALUE IS 'I'.
           02  DFHPF22   PIC X VALUE IS '¢'.
           02  DFHPF23   PIC X VALUE IS '.'.
           02  DFHPF24   PIC X VALUE IS '<'.

cics_copybooks.name: CICS BMS Character Attributes
cics_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * DFHBMSCA - BMS SCREEN ATTRIBUTE DEFINITIONS                   *
      ******************************************************************
       01  DFHBMSCA.
           02  DFHBMPEM PIC X VALUE IS 'H'.    *> MDT ON
           02  DFHBMPRO PIC X VALUE IS '-'.    *> PROTECTED
           02  DFHBMASK PIC X VALUE IS '0'.    *> ASKIP
           02  DFHBMUNP PIC X VALUE IS ' '.    *> UNPROTECTED
           02  DFHBMUNN PIC X VALUE IS '&'.    *> UNPROT NUM
           02  DFHBMPRF PIC X VALUE IS '/''.   *> PROT FSET
           02  DFHBMASF PIC X VALUE IS '1'.    *> ASKIP FSET
           02  DFHBMASB PIC X VALUE IS '8'.    *> ASKIP BRT
           02  DFHBMPNF PIC X VALUE IS 'A'.    *> PROT NUM FSET
           02  DFHBMPBR PIC X VALUE IS 'Y'.    *> PROT BRT
           02  DFHBMPDA PIC X VALUE IS '<'.    *> PROT DRK
           02  DFHBMDAR PIC X VALUE IS '%'.    *> DRK/PROT
           02  DFHBMFSE PIC X VALUE IS 'A'.    *> FSET
           02  DFHSA    PIC X VALUE IS X'00'.  *> START FIELD
           02  DFHCOLOR PIC X VALUE IS X'00'.  *> COLOR
           02  DFHPS    PIC X VALUE IS X'00'.  *> PROG SYMBOL
           02  DFHHLT   PIC X VALUE IS X'00'.  *> HIGHLIGHTING
           02  DFHVAL   PIC X VALUE IS X'00'.  *> VALIDATION
           02  DFHOUTLN PIC X VALUE IS X'00'.  *> OUTLINING
           02  DFHBKTRN PIC X VALUE IS X'00'.  *> BACKGROUND
      *
      * EXTENDED HIGHLIGHTING VALUES
           02  DFHDFLT  PIC X VALUE IS X'00'.  *> DEFAULT
           02  DFHBLINK PIC X VALUE IS X'F1'.  *> BLINK
           02  DFHREVRS PIC X VALUE IS X'F2'.  *> REVERSE VIDEO
           02  DFHUNDLN PIC X VALUE IS X'F4'.  *> UNDERSCORE
      *
      * COLOR VALUES
           02  DFHBLUE  PIC X VALUE IS X'F1'.
           02  DFHRED   PIC X VALUE IS X'F2'.
           02  DFHPINK  PIC X VALUE IS X'F3'.
           02  DFHGREEN PIC X VALUE IS X'F4'.
           02  DFHTURQ  PIC X VALUE IS X'F5'.
           02  DFHYELLO PIC X VALUE IS X'F6'.
           02  DFHNEUT  PIC X VALUE IS X'F7'.

cics_copybooks.name: CICS Execute Interface Block
cics_copybooks.description: CICS EIB structure containing transaction context
cics_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * DFHEIBLK - CICS EXECUTE INTERFACE BLOCK                       *
      ******************************************************************
       01  DFHEIBLK.
           02  EIBTIME   PIC S9(7) COMP-3.    *> TIME HHMMSS0
           02  EIBDATE   PIC S9(7) COMP-3.    *> DATE 0CYYDDD
           02  EIBTRNID  PIC X(4).            *> TRANSACTION ID
           02  EIBTASKN  PIC S9(7) COMP-3.    *> TASK NUMBER
           02  EIBTRMID  PIC X(4).            *> TERMINAL ID
           02  DFHEIGDI  PIC S9(4) COMP.      *> RESERVED
           02  EIBCPOSN  PIC S9(4) COMP.      *> CURSOR POSITION
           02  EIBCALEN  PIC S9(4) COMP.      *> COMMAREA LENGTH
           02  EIBAID    PIC X.               *> ATTENTION ID
           02  EIBFN     PIC X(2).            *> FUNCTION CODE
           02  EIBRCODE  PIC X(6).            *> RESPONSE CODE
           02  EIBDS     PIC X(8).            *> DATASET NAME
           02  EIBREQID  PIC X(8).            *> REQUEST ID
           02  EIBRSRCE  PIC X(8).            *> RESOURCE NAME
           02  EIBSYNC   PIC X.               *> SYNCPOINT
           02  EIBFREE   PIC X.               *> FREE TERMINAL
           02  EIBRECV   PIC X.               *> RECEIVE
           02  EIBSEND   PIC X.               *> SEND
           02  EIBATT    PIC X.               *> ATTACH
           02  EIBEOC    PIC X.               *> END OF CHAIN
           02  EIBFMH    PIC X.               *> FMH RECEIVED
           02  EIBCOMPL  PIC X.               *> DATA COMPLETE
           02  EIBSIG    PIC X.               *> SIGNAL
           02  EIBCONF   PIC X.               *> CONFIRM
           02  EIBERR    PIC X.               *> ERROR
           02  EIBERRCD  PIC X(4).            *> ERROR CODE
           02  EIBSYNRB  PIC X.               *> SYNCPOINT RB
           02  EIBNODAT  PIC X.               *> NO DATA
           02  EIBRESP   PIC S9(8) COMP.      *> RESP
           02  EIBRESP2  PIC S9(8) COMP.      *> RESP2

modern_equivalent.notes: In modern systems, transaction context is managed via ThreadLocal, Spring RequestScope, or distributed tracing (OpenTelemetry)

cics_copybooks.name: CICS Communication Area Template
cics_copybooks.description: Standard COMMAREA structure for inter-program communication
cics_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * COMMAREA - STANDARD COMMUNICATION AREA                        *
      ******************************************************************
       01  DFHCOMMAREA.
           05  CA-REQUEST-TYPE        PIC X(4).
              88  CA-REQ-INQUIRY      VALUE 'INQY'.
              88  CA-REQ-ADD          VALUE 'ADD '.
              88  CA-REQ-UPDATE       VALUE 'UPDT'.
              88  CA-REQ-DELETE       VALUE 'DELT'.
              88  CA-REQ-LIST         VALUE 'LIST'.
           05  CA-RESPONSE-CODE       PIC X(2).
              88  CA-RESP-SUCCESS     VALUE '00'.
              88  CA-RESP-NOT-FOUND   VALUE '01'.
              88  CA-RESP-DUPLICATE   VALUE '02'.
              88  CA-RESP-ERROR       VALUE '99'.
           05  CA-MESSAGE             PIC X(80).
           05  CA-KEY-DATA.
              10  CA-CUSTOMER-ID      PIC X(10).
              10  CA-ACCOUNT-ID       PIC X(12).
           05  CA-CUSTOMER-DATA.
              10  CA-CUST-NAME        PIC X(50).
              10  CA-CUST-ADDRESS     PIC X(100).
              10  CA-CUST-PHONE       PIC X(15).
              10  CA-CUST-EMAIL       PIC X(100).
              10  CA-CUST-TYPE        PIC X(1).
              10  CA-CUST-STATUS      PIC X(1).
           05  CA-ACCOUNT-DATA.
              10  CA-ACCT-TYPE        PIC X(2).
              10  CA-ACCT-STATUS      PIC X(1).
              10  CA-ACCT-BALANCE     PIC S9(13)V99 COMP-3.
              10  CA-ACCT-AVAILABLE   PIC S9(13)V99 COMP-3.
           05  CA-PAGINATION.
              10  CA-PAGE-NUMBER      PIC 9(4).
              10  CA-PAGE-SIZE        PIC 9(4).
              10  CA-TOTAL-RECORDS    PIC 9(8).
           05  CA-AUDIT-DATA.
              10  CA-USER-ID          PIC X(8).
              10  CA-TIMESTAMP        PIC X(26).
              10  CA-TERMINAL-ID      PIC X(4).

ims_copybooks.name: IMS Program Communication Block
ims_copybooks.description: IMS PCB mask for database and transaction processing
ims_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * IMS PCB MASK - DATABASE PCB                                   *
      ******************************************************************
       01  DB-PCB-MASK.
           05  DBD-NAME            PIC X(8).    *> DATABASE NAME
           05  SEG-LEVEL           PIC X(2).    *> SEGMENT LEVEL
           05  STATUS-CODE         PIC X(2).    *> STATUS CODE
              88  STATUS-OK        VALUE '  ' 'GA' 'GB' 'GC' 'GK'.
              88  STATUS-NOT-FOUND VALUE 'GE'.
              88  STATUS-END-DB    VALUE 'GB'.
              88  STATUS-END-PARENT VALUE 'GK'.
              88  STATUS-NO-MORE   VALUE 'GE'.
              88  STATUS-DUP-KEY   VALUE 'II'.
              88  STATUS-SEQ-ERROR VALUE 'DJ'.
           05  PROC-OPTIONS        PIC X(4).    *> PROCESSING OPTIONS
           05  RESERVED-DLI        PIC S9(5) COMP. *> RESERVED
           05  SEG-NAME-FB         PIC X(8).    *> SEGMENT NAME
           05  LENGTH-FB-KEY       PIC S9(5) COMP. *> KEY LENGTH
           05  NUMB-SENS-SEGS      PIC S9(5) COMP. *> SENSITIVE SEGS
           05  KEY-FB-AREA         PIC X(256).  *> KEY FEEDBACK
      ******************************************************************
      * IMS PCB MASK - I/O PCB (TRANSACTION MANAGER)                  *
      ******************************************************************
       01  IO-PCB-MASK.
           05  LTERM-NAME          PIC X(8).    *> LOGICAL TERMINAL
           05  IO-RESERVED-1       PIC X(2).    *> RESERVED
           05  IO-STATUS-CODE      PIC X(2).    *> STATUS CODE
              88  IO-STATUS-OK     VALUE '  '.
              88  IO-MSG-AVAILABLE VALUE 'CF'.
              88  IO-NO-MORE-MSG   VALUE 'QC' 'QD'.
           05  IO-DATE             PIC S9(7) COMP-3. *> DATE
           05  IO-TIME             PIC S9(7) COMP-3. *> TIME
           05  INPUT-MSG-SEQ       PIC S9(5) COMP. *> INPUT SEQ
           05  MOD-NAME            PIC X(8).    *> MOD NAME
           05  USER-ID             PIC X(8).    *> USER ID

common_status_codes.GA: Successful GU/GN - segment at lower level
common_status_codes.GC: Successful, returned to higher level in hierarchy
common_status_codes.GK: Segment at different level or end of segment type

ims_copybooks.name: IMS Segment Search Argument
ims_copybooks.description: SSA copybook for qualified database calls
ims_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * IMS SSA (SEGMENT SEARCH ARGUMENT) DEFINITIONS                 *
      ******************************************************************
       01  SSA-UNQUALIFIED.
           05  SSA-SEG-NAME        PIC X(8).
           05  SSA-COMMAND-CODE    PIC X.
              88  SSA-CMD-NONE     VALUE ' '.
              88  SSA-CMD-FIRST    VALUE 'F'.  *> FIRST OCCURRENCE
              88  SSA-CMD-LAST     VALUE 'L'.  *> LAST OCCURRENCE
              88  SSA-CMD-CONCAT   VALUE 'D'.  *> CONCATENATED KEY
              88  SSA-CMD-PATH     VALUE 'P'.  *> PATH CALL
              88  SSA-CMD-NULL     VALUE 'N'.  *> NULL
              88  SSA-CMD-INSERT   VALUE 'I'.  *> INSERT PARENT
           05  FILLER              PIC X VALUE ' '.

       01  SSA-QUALIFIED.
           05  SSA-SEG-NAME-Q      PIC X(8).
           05  SSA-LEFT-PAREN      PIC X VALUE '('.
           05  SSA-KEY-NAME        PIC X(8).
           05  SSA-OPERATOR        PIC X(2).
              88  SSA-OP-EQUAL     VALUE ' ='.
              88  SSA-OP-GT        VALUE ' >'.
              88  SSA-OP-GE        VALUE '>='.
              88  SSA-OP-LT        VALUE ' <'.
              88  SSA-OP-LE        VALUE '<='.
              88  SSA-OP-NE        VALUE '¬='.
           05  SSA-KEY-VALUE       PIC X(256).
           05  SSA-RIGHT-PAREN     PIC X VALUE ')'.

       01  SSA-CUSTOMER REDEFINES SSA-QUALIFIED.
           05  FILLER              PIC X(8) VALUE 'CUSTOMER'.
           05  FILLER              PIC X VALUE '('.
           05  FILLER              PIC X(8) VALUE 'CUSTKEY '.
           05  FILLER              PIC X(2) VALUE ' ='.
           05  SSA-CUST-KEY        PIC X(10).
           05  FILLER              PIC X VALUE ')'.

financial_copybooks.name: General Ledger Entry
financial_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * GLENTRY - GENERAL LEDGER ENTRY COPYBOOK                       *
      ******************************************************************
       01  GL-ENTRY-RECORD.
           05  GL-ENTRY-ID         PIC X(20).
           05  GL-BATCH-ID         PIC X(10).
           05  GL-JOURNAL-TYPE     PIC X(2).
              88  GL-TYPE-STANDARD VALUE 'ST'.
              88  GL-TYPE-ADJUSTING VALUE 'AJ'.
              88  GL-TYPE-CLOSING  VALUE 'CL'.
              88  GL-TYPE-REVERSING VALUE 'RV'.
           05  GL-ENTRY-DATE       PIC 9(8).   *> YYYYMMDD
           05  GL-POST-DATE        PIC 9(8).
           05  GL-PERIOD           PIC 9(6).   *> YYYYMM
           05  GL-ACCOUNT-NUM      PIC X(15).
           05  GL-COST-CENTER      PIC X(10).
           05  GL-DEPT-CODE        PIC X(6).
           05  GL-PROJECT-CODE     PIC X(12).
           05  GL-DEBIT-AMT        PIC S9(15)V99 COMP-3.
           05  GL-CREDIT-AMT       PIC S9(15)V99 COMP-3.
           05  GL-CURRENCY         PIC X(3).
           05  GL-EXCHANGE-RATE    PIC S9(3)V9(6) COMP-3.
           05  GL-BASE-DEBIT       PIC S9(15)V99 COMP-3.
           05  GL-BASE-CREDIT      PIC S9(15)V99 COMP-3.
           05  GL-DESCRIPTION      PIC X(50).
           05  GL-REFERENCE        PIC X(30).

           05  GL-USER-ID          PIC X(8).
           05  GL-TIMESTAMP        PIC X(26).
           05  GL-AUDIT-TRAIL      PIC X(50).
           05  GL-STATUS           PIC X(1).
              88  GL-STATUS-ENTERED VALUE 'E'.
              88  GL-STATUS-APPROVED VALUE 'A'.
              88  GL-STATUS-POSTED VALUE 'P'.
              88  GL-STATUS-REVERSED VALUE 'R'.

calculation_logic.monthly_payment:
PMT = P * [r(1+r)^n] / [(1+r)^n - 1]
Where P=principal, r=monthly rate, n=number of payments
calculation_logic.interest_portion:
Interest = Beginning Balance * (Annual Rate / 12)
Or with day count: Interest = Balance * Rate * Days / DaysInYear

financial_copybooks.name: ACH Batch Header/Entry
financial_copybooks.description: NACHA ACH file format for electronic payments
financial_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * ACHBATCH - ACH BATCH HEADER RECORD (5 RECORD)                 *
      ******************************************************************
       01  ACH-BATCH-HEADER.
           05  ACH-5-RECORD-TYPE   PIC 9(1) VALUE 5.
           05  ACH-5-SERVICE-CLASS PIC 9(3).
              88  ACH-MIXED        VALUE 200.
              88  ACH-CREDITS-ONLY VALUE 220.
              88  ACH-DEBITS-ONLY  VALUE 225.
           05  ACH-5-COMPANY-NAME  PIC X(16).
           05  ACH-5-DISC-DATA     PIC X(20).
           05  ACH-5-COMPANY-ID    PIC X(10).
           05  ACH-5-ENTRY-CLASS   PIC X(3).
              88  ACH-PPD          VALUE 'PPD'. *> PREARRANGED
              88  ACH-CCD          VALUE 'CCD'. *> CORPORATE
              88  ACH-CTX          VALUE 'CTX'. *> CORP TRADE
              88  ACH-WEB          VALUE 'WEB'. *> INTERNET
              88  ACH-TEL          VALUE 'TEL'. *> TELEPHONE
           05  ACH-5-ENTRY-DESC    PIC X(10).
           05  ACH-5-DESC-DATE     PIC X(6).
           05  ACH-5-EFF-DATE      PIC 9(6).   *> YYMMDD
           05  ACH-5-SETTLE-DATE   PIC X(3).
           05  ACH-5-ORIG-STATUS   PIC X(1) VALUE '1'.
           05  ACH-5-ORIG-DFI      PIC 9(8).
           05  ACH-5-BATCH-NUM     PIC 9(7).
      ******************************************************************
      * ACH ENTRY DETAIL RECORD (6 RECORD)                            *
      ******************************************************************
       01  ACH-ENTRY-DETAIL.
           05  ACH-6-RECORD-TYPE   PIC 9(1) VALUE 6.
           05  ACH-6-TRANS-CODE    PIC 9(2).
              88  ACH-CHECKING-CREDIT VALUE 22.
              88  ACH-CHECKING-DEBIT  VALUE 27.
              88  ACH-SAVINGS-CREDIT  VALUE 32.
              88  ACH-SAVINGS-DEBIT   VALUE 37.
              88  ACH-PRENOTE-CR      VALUE 23.
              88  ACH-PRENOTE-DB      VALUE 28.
           05  ACH-6-RDFI          PIC 9(8).
           05  ACH-6-CHECK-DIGIT   PIC 9(1).
           05  ACH-6-DFI-ACCT      PIC X(17).
           05  ACH-6-AMOUNT        PIC 9(10).  *> IN CENTS
           05  ACH-6-INDIV-ID      PIC X(15).
           05  ACH-6-INDIV-NAME    PIC X(22).
           05  ACH-6-DISC-DATA     PIC X(2).
           05  ACH-6-ADDENDA-IND   PIC 9(1).
           05  ACH-6-TRACE-NUM     PIC 9(15).

financial_copybooks.name: ISO 8583 Message Structure
financial_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * ISO8583 - ISO 8583 MESSAGE STRUCTURE                          *
      ******************************************************************
       01  ISO-MESSAGE.
           05  ISO-MTI             PIC X(4).
              88  ISO-AUTH-REQUEST    VALUE '0100'.
              88  ISO-AUTH-RESPONSE   VALUE '0110'.
              88  ISO-FINANCIAL-REQ   VALUE '0200'.
              88  ISO-FINANCIAL-RESP  VALUE '0210'.
              88  ISO-REVERSAL-REQ    VALUE '0400'.
              88  ISO-REVERSAL-RESP   VALUE '0410'.
              88  ISO-NETWORK-MGMT    VALUE '0800'.
           05  ISO-BITMAP          PIC X(16).  *> PRIMARY BITMAP
           05  ISO-BITMAP-2        PIC X(16).  *> SECONDARY BITMAP
           05  ISO-FIELDS.
              10  ISO-PAN          PIC X(19).        *> DE 2
              10  ISO-PROC-CODE    PIC X(6).         *> DE 3
              10  ISO-AMOUNT       PIC 9(12).        *> DE 4
              10  ISO-TRANS-DATE   PIC 9(10).        *> DE 7 MMDDHHMMSS
              10  ISO-STAN         PIC 9(6).         *> DE 11
              10  ISO-LOCAL-TIME   PIC 9(6).         *> DE 12
              10  ISO-LOCAL-DATE   PIC 9(4).         *> DE 13
              10  ISO-EXPIRY       PIC 9(4).         *> DE 14
              10  ISO-SETTLE-DATE  PIC 9(4).         *> DE 15
              10  ISO-MCC          PIC X(4).         *> DE 18
              10  ISO-POS-ENTRY    PIC X(3).         *> DE 22
              10  ISO-CARD-SEQ     PIC 9(3).         *> DE 23
              10  ISO-NII          PIC X(3).         *> DE 24
              10  ISO-POS-COND     PIC X(2).         *> DE 25
              10  ISO-ACQU-ID      PIC X(11).        *> DE 32
              10  ISO-TRACK-2      PIC X(37).        *> DE 35
              10  ISO-RRN          PIC X(12).        *> DE 37
              10  ISO-AUTH-CODE    PIC X(6).         *> DE 38
              10  ISO-RESP-CODE    PIC X(2).         *> DE 39
                 88  ISO-APPROVED     VALUE '00'.
                 88  ISO-REFER        VALUE '01'.
                 88  ISO-DECLINED     VALUE '05'.
                 88  ISO-INVALID-CARD VALUE '14'.
                 88  ISO-EXPIRED      VALUE '54'.
                 88  ISO-WRONG-PIN    VALUE '55'.
                 88  ISO-EXCEED-LIMIT VALUE '61'.
              10  ISO-TERMINAL-ID  PIC X(8).         *> DE 41
              10  ISO-MERCHANT-ID  PIC X(15).        *> DE 42
              10  ISO-MERCHANT-NAME PIC X(40).       *> DE 43
              10  ISO-CURRENCY     PIC X(3).         *> DE 49
              10  ISO-PIN-BLOCK    PIC X(16).        *> DE 52
              10  ISO-ADD-AMOUNTS  PIC X(20).        *> DE 54

hipaa_notes: All PHI fields must be encrypted at rest
Audit logging required for all access
Minimum necessary data only in transit

common_copybooks.name: Standard Error Handling
common_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * ERRHAND - STANDARD ERROR HANDLING COPYBOOK                    *
      ******************************************************************
       01  WS-ERROR-AREA.
           05  WS-ERROR-FLAG       PIC X(1) VALUE 'N'.
              88  ERROR-OCCURRED   VALUE 'Y'.
              88  NO-ERROR         VALUE 'N'.
           05  WS-ERROR-CODE       PIC X(8).
           05  WS-ERROR-MESSAGE    PIC X(200).
           05  WS-ERROR-SEVERITY   PIC 9(1).
              88  ERR-INFO         VALUE 0.
              88  ERR-WARNING      VALUE 1.
              88  ERR-ERROR        VALUE 2.
              88  ERR-SEVERE       VALUE 3.
              88  ERR-CRITICAL     VALUE 4.
           05  WS-ERROR-SOURCE     PIC X(30).
           05  WS-ERROR-TIMESTAMP  PIC X(26).
           05  WS-ERROR-COUNT      PIC 9(5) VALUE 0.
           05  WS-ERROR-STACK OCCURS 10 TIMES.
              10  WS-ES-CODE       PIC X(8).
              10  WS-ES-MESSAGE    PIC X(100).
              10  WS-ES-LOCATION   PIC X(30).

       01  WS-ERROR-CODES.
           05  ERR-DB2-ERROR       PIC X(8) VALUE 'ERRDB001'.
           05  ERR-VSAM-ERROR      PIC X(8) VALUE 'ERRVS001'.
           05  ERR-CICS-ERROR      PIC X(8) VALUE 'ERRCI001'.
           05  ERR-DATA-INVALID    PIC X(8) VALUE 'ERRDT001'.
           05  ERR-NOT-FOUND       PIC X(8) VALUE 'ERRNF001'.
           05  ERR-DUPLICATE       PIC X(8) VALUE 'ERRDU001'.
           05  ERR-OVERFLOW        PIC X(8) VALUE 'ERROV001'.
           05  ERR-AUTHORIZATION   PIC X(8) VALUE 'ERRAU001'.

                                   PIC 9(8).

                                   PIC 9(7).

      * Y2K WINDOWING FIELDS

           05  WS-Y2K-WORK.
              10  WS-Y2K-YY        PIC 9(2).
              10  WS-Y2K-CENTURY   PIC 9(2).
              10  WS-Y2K-FULL-YEAR PIC 9(4).
      *
      * DAYS IN MONTH TABLE
       01  WS-DAYS-IN-MONTH-TABLE.
           05  FILLER              PIC X(24) VALUE
               '312831303130313130313031'.
       01  WS-DAYS-IN-MONTH REDEFINES WS-DAYS-IN-MONTH-TABLE.
           05  WS-DIM-ENTRY        PIC 9(2) OCCURS 12.

common_copybooks.name: Audit Logging Structure
common_copybooks.cobol:
******************************************************************
      * AUDITLOG - AUDIT LOGGING COPYBOOK                             *
      * FOR SOX/HIPAA/PCI-DSS COMPLIANCE                              *
      ******************************************************************
       01  AUDIT-LOG-RECORD.
           05  AUD-TIMESTAMP       PIC X(26).
           05  AUD-EVENT-TYPE      PIC X(4).
              88  AUD-CREATE       VALUE 'CREA'.
              88  AUD-READ         VALUE 'READ'.
              88  AUD-UPDATE       VALUE 'UPDT'.
              88  AUD-DELETE       VALUE 'DELT'.
              88  AUD-LOGIN        VALUE 'LOGN'.
              88  AUD-LOGOUT       VALUE 'LOGO'.
              88  AUD-AUTH-FAIL    VALUE 'AFAL'.
              88  AUD-PRIV-ESC     VALUE 'PESC'.
              88  AUD-EXPORT       VALUE 'EXPT'.
              88  AUD-PRINT        VALUE 'PRNT'.
           05  AUD-USER-ID         PIC X(8).
           05  AUD-TERMINAL-ID     PIC X(8).
           05  AUD-PROGRAM-ID      PIC X(8).
           05  AUD-TRANSACTION-ID  PIC X(4).
           05  AUD-RESOURCE-TYPE   PIC X(8).
           05  AUD-RESOURCE-NAME   PIC X(44).
           05  AUD-KEY-VALUES      PIC X(100).
           05  AUD-BEFORE-IMAGE    PIC X(500).
           05  AUD-AFTER-IMAGE     PIC X(500).
           05  AUD-RESULT-CODE     PIC X(4).
           05  AUD-IP-ADDRESS      PIC X(45).
           05  AUD-SESSION-ID      PIC X(32).
           05  AUD-CORRELATION-ID  PIC X(36).
           05  AUD-BUSINESS-UNIT   PIC X(10).
           05  AUD-SENSITIVITY     PIC X(2).
              88  AUD-SENS-PUBLIC  VALUE 'PU'.
              88  AUD-SENS-INTERNAL VALUE 'IN'.
              88  AUD-SENS-CONFID  VALUE 'CO'.
              88  AUD-SENS-PHI     VALUE 'PH'. *> HIPAA
              88  AUD-SENS-PCI     VALUE 'PC'. *> PCI-DSS
              88  AUD-SENS-SOX     VALUE 'SX'. *> SOX
           05  AUD-HASH            PIC X(64). *> SHA-256 INTEGRITY
